NOTES:
Right this is a mixture of almost every release :lol:
Well i was syncing prevails audio to the russian cam and then yesterday mvs released their proper....and after checking i seen they
did what i was doing using the same sources.....could be wrong but pretty sure it&#039;s prevails audio they used has the 2 parts that have no audio(only a 1 sec long)
are also missing on prevails release,but they just cropped the footage aswell.
Anyway qualiy is good,not has good has pdf&#039;s video but that was a right pain to try and sync......the only real difference between the 2 releases are the russian ones
is cropped too much at the bottom.
Video itself is good but too bright and also had missing frames here and there ......audio is good for a direct line.


WORK DONE:
Well firstly i needed to strip the audio off the mvs release and save that.....then i muxed it the russian cam.
For the video i had to find the missing frames and cut them out of the other releases and add them into this release.....it&#039;s just a 8seconds here and
a 4 seconds there etc....oh also added the footage after the credits aswell to this release has it was missing off the mvs release.
Once i sorted all my video out i needed to filter the video...i changed the chroma.gamma,lum,rgb black base,contrast and also needed to do some cropping to get rid
of some black borders.
Then final it was a case of watching the old cam release and making notes of the english subs and add them to the video.


Ps PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD MY RELEASES IF YOU DON&#039;T LIKE RE-ENCODES OR IF YOU THINK BY SOME
HOW ME RE-ENCODING THEM IS GOING TO MAKE THEM LOOK LIKE R5&#039;S....BECAUSE THEY DON&#039;T!!!!!

Anyway enjoy the movie,it&#039;s free!!!!
